hero.tagline: Quality language learning and academic support
hero.subtitle: Learn English, French, or improve your school subjects with close, practical, and personalized support. At Myker Academy, we help you progress with confidence… and enjoy the process!

about.title: We support your learning with proximity, motivation, and quality
about.p1: At Myker Academy, we specialize in English, French, and academic support for primary, secondary, and high school students. Our aim is to offer a space where every student feels supported, motivated, and capable of reaching their academic and linguistic goals.
about.p2: We believe in practical, dynamic, and personalized teaching. That’s why we work with small groups, committed teachers, and an approach that combines real communication, foundational reinforcement, and student confidence. Whether you're learning English from scratch, improving French, passing mathematics, or recovering a subject, Myker Academy helps you progress step by step with close and effective guidance.
about.quote: “At Myker Academy, we learn with confidence. Our goal is for every student to progress, improve, and enjoy the process.”

items.title: Qualified and approachable teachers
items.description: A young, well-prepared, and passionate team dedicated to teaching languages and reinforcing key school subjects.

items.title: Small groups
items.description: Small classes to ensure real attention and active, participatory learning.

items.title: Flexible schedules
items.description: Different afternoon time slots and private-class packs to adapt to each situation.

items.title: Practical and motivating method
items.description: In both language learning and school support, we teach through useful, dynamic activities focused on real understanding.

courses.title: Training adapted to you
courses.subtitle: We offer a wide variety of courses and modalities to ensure you find the perfect path toward mastering the language.
courses.ctaTitle: Ready to take the first step?
courses.ctaSubtitle: Join our student community and start building your future today.

english.title: English Classes
english.desc: At Myker Academy, we offer both group and private English classes, adapted to every age, level, and objective. Group classes are organized according to school year to guarantee effective, dynamic learning.

french.title: French Classes
french.desc: Learn French with a practical, dynamic method. Conversation, useful vocabulary, and real-life situations so you can communicate from day one.

math.title: Mathematics Classes
math.desc: Math support for primary, secondary, and high school: guided exercises, clear explanations, and essential reinforcement. Ideal for improving grades, regaining motivation, and better understanding the subject.

school.title: School Support
school.desc: Support in all subjects: language, science, social studies, Catalan, study techniques… We help students with homework, tests, and organization—turning studying into a habit.

modalities.title: Individual or Group
modalities.desc: Choose the modality that best fits your learning style.

schedule.title: Flexible Schedules
schedule.desc: We adapt to your routine. Morning and afternoon classes available.

english.title: English Course
english.desc: Learn English from zero or improve your level with dynamic, practical classes tailored to your objectives.
english.p1: In this course, you will work on listening comprehension, writing, vocabulary, and grammar.
english.p2: Ideal for students needing school support, adults returning to the language, or people who want to improve for work.
english.p3: A methodology based on real communication and natural language progression.

french.title: French Course
french.desc: Immerse yourself in French with practical classes focused on real communication.
french.p1: Learn common expressions, grammatical structures, and conversation techniques.
french.p2: Ideal for beginners and students with previous knowledge.

german.title: German Course
german.desc: Learn German with a clear, structured, and motivating methodology.
german.p1: We work on useful vocabulary, step-by-step grammar, and listening comprehension.
german.p2: Ideal for students seeking solid, consistent progress.

school.title: School Support
school.desc: Academic support for primary, secondary, and high school.
school.p1: Reinforcement in mathematics, languages, science, and more.
school.p2: Close support to improve study habits and self-esteem.

modalities.title: Modalities and Class Types
modalities.desc: Choose between individual classes, pair classes, or small groups.
modalities.p1: We adapt sessions to your rhythm, schedule, and learning style.

schedule.title: Available Schedules
schedule.desc: Check our morning and afternoon time slots.
schedule.p1: We offer total flexibility so you can learn without giving up your responsibilities.

englishFull.title: English Classes
englishFull.description: Group and private classes adapted to every age, level, and objective.
englishFull.intro: Group classes are organized according to school year to ensure appropriate, dynamic, and effective learning. We also offer fully personalized private classes.
englishFull.scheduleNote: (Small groups organized by school year and level)
englishFull.privateDesc1: At Myker Academy, we offer both group and private English classes adapted to every age, level, and objective.
englishFull.privateDesc2: Available for all ages and levels: conversation, school support, exam preparation, business English, or interview training. Schedules depend on the availability of both student and teacher.

frenchFull.title: More Information – French Classes
frenchFull.description: Classes adapted to each student according to their level and goals.
frenchFull.desc1: At Myker Academy, we offer personalized French classes adapted to each student. Most choose private lessons due to their specific goals: improving conversation, passing a school subject, preparing an official exam, reinforcing grammar, or starting from zero.
frenchFull.desc2: Private lessons allow progress at the right pace and focus on the student's real needs.
frenchFull.scheduleNote: Available for those who prefer learning in a group according to their level.

monday.title: Monday
groups: Ideal for people starting from zero or with basic knowledge.

wednesday.title: Wednesday
groups: Designed for those who already manage but want to gain fluency, vocabulary, and confidence.

friday.title: Friday
groups: Sessions focused on conversation, pronunciation, and spontaneous expression.

frenchFull.privateDesc1: Perfect for students with specific goals or different learning rhythms. You can work on:
privateDesc2_list: Support for high school or university subjects
frenchFull.privateDesc3: Schedules adapt to the availability of the student and the teacher.

mathFull.title: Mathematics Classes
mathFull.desc1: At Myker Academy, most math classes are private, as each student needs a different pace, level, and type of support. Private sessions allow working exactly on what the student needs: homework, exam preparation, math foundations, problem solving, or improving comprehension.
mathFull.desc2: We also have a small 4th ESO group, ideal for students who want to advance with shared support and continuous guidance.
mathFull.scheduleNote: (Small groups focused on support and comprehension)

schoolFull.title: More Information – School Support
schoolFull.desc1: At Myker Academy, school support is mainly provided through private lessons, as each student has different needs, rhythms, and difficulties. This allows for fully personalized work: homework, exam preparation, retakes, organization and study techniques, and reinforcement of specific subjects (language, Catalan, science, social studies, etc.).
schoolFull.desc2: Private lessons guarantee close and effective support, adapted to the real level of each student and focused on improving academic performance and confidence. Schedules are set according to teacher and student availability.

cards.groupDesc: Small groups to learn in a motivating, dynamic, and participatory environment. Available for English, French, and school support.
cards.individualDesc: 100% personalized sessions to progress faster: languages, support, exam preparation, or specific help.

extras: Reinforcement of study habits and techniques
schoolFull.scheduleNote: School support schedules are assigned according to the availability of the teacher and the student.

modalitiesSection.intro: Choose the format and schedule that best suit you. At Myker Academy, we adapt to your daily routine so that learning a language fits your work, studies, or family life.

groups.title: Small Groups

metodologySection.title: A practical methodology to progress step by step
metodologySection.subtitle: We combine real communication, academic reinforcement, applied grammar, and dynamic activities so that you use what you learn from day one.

methodology.title: Myker Methodology
items: Practical activities in pairs and groups
Periodic evaluations to measure your progress

followup.title: Follow-up and Objectives
followup.intro: We define clear goals with you and review your progress regularly.
items: Direct communication with the teaching team

levelsList.name: Beginner
levelsList.desc: First contact with the language. Basic vocabulary, everyday expressions, and simple structures.
levelsList.ideal: People starting from zero or with very basic knowledge.

levelsList.name: Intermediate
levelsList.desc: Able to manage everyday situations, simple conversations, and short texts.
levelsList.ideal: People who can communicate but want more confidence and fluency.

levelsList.name: Upper Intermediate
levelsList.desc: Understanding more complex texts, debates, and academic or professional situations.
levelsList.ideal: People who need the language for studies or work.

levelsList.name: Advanced
levelsList.desc: Flexible and effective language use in formal and informal contexts with high precision.
levelsList.ideal: Advanced users wanting to refine nuance, vocabulary, and register.

metodologySection.finalNote: We offer a free initial level test to assign you to the right group and recommend the best learning path for your goals.

examsSection.title: Prepare for your official certifications
examsSection.subtitle: We design specific learning paths so you can take official exams with confidence. At Myker Academy, we work with real exam practice, mock tests, strategies, and personalized follow-up to help you succeed.

english.label: Exam Preparation
extras: Strategies for speaking, listening, reading, and writing
Personalized recommendations to take the exam confidently
english.description: Our Cambridge preparation is designed to help you reach the exam confident, with real practice and visible results.
english.footer: Check upcoming sessions and available preparation groups.

french.label: Exam Preparation
french.descriptionTitle: We help you prepare official French exams through:
descriptionList: Activities to improve written and oral comprehension
Written production with models, corrections, and strategies
Techniques to improve fluency, vocabulary, and pronunciation
french.footer: Our goal is for you to reach your exam confident, mastering the format and equipped with the necessary practice to succeed.

pricesSection.title: Choose the plan that suits you best
pricesSection.subtitle: Prices vary according to level and modality. We can adjust the proposal depending on your goals, class frequency, and course type.

groupsKids.title: Group Classes (5–18 years)
groupsKids.desc: Small-group classes for children and teens, organized by age and level.

groupsAdults.title: Group Classes for Adults
groupsAdults.desc: Designed for adults who want to progress, maintain fluency, or prepare specific objectives.

individual.title: Private Classes

pricesSection.ctaNote: Prices are indicative and may vary depending on course duration, number of students, and class type. Contact us for a personalized proposal.

items.name: Inés
items.bio: A native French speaker passionate about teaching since childhood. Inés has always dreamed of becoming a teacher and sharing everything she knows. She loves working with children and creating a fun, dynamic, and warm environment for learning without fear. Languages are her great passion, and her contagious energy makes every class special. She also handles all student inquiries and accompanies families throughout the process.

items.name: Alex
items.bio: Highly appreciated by younger students, Alex combines teaching with an energetic, active, and playful style. He enjoys motivating children, helping them overcome academic challenges, and creating dynamic lessons full of movement, laughter, and meaningful learning.

items.name: Mike
items.bio: A native English teacher with extensive experience. Mike stands out for his approachability, empathy, and ability to turn each class into a motivating and enriching experience. He mainly teaches adults, helping them achieve professional goals, exam preparation, and real communication improvement. With him, learning English feels natural and achievable.

items.name: Noa
items.bio: A specialist in primary education with a unique talent for connecting with young children. Her sweetness, creativity, and patience make students enjoy lessons so much that they always want to return. Her aim is for children to learn English naturally, through play and in a safe environment.

items.name: Laia
items.bio: After living in Canada, Laia brings her love for English-speaking culture and a real, modern English to her classes. She shares her international experience through dynamic activities, engaging lessons, and a practical method that motivates every student. Her approach combines closeness, cultural immersion, and authentic learning.

faq.title: We answer your most common questions
faq.subtitle: If you have any additional questions about schedules, prices, levels, or booking, write to us directly and we’ll reply as soon as possible.

items.q: How do I know my level?
items.a: We offer a free level test, online or in person, to assign you to the right group or suggest the type of class (group or private) that best suits your goals. In less than 15 minutes, we can determine your starting point.

Yes, group classes require a yearly enrollment fee of €30, which guarantees your place for the entire school year. Additionally, the first month includes a required €15 payment for materials (initial booklet and digital resources). Private classes do not require enrollment.

items.q: Can I make up a missed class?
items.a: Yes. In regular groups, make-up options are available when another group of the same level and age has space. If no alternative is available that week, we provide materials so you can keep up.

items.q: Do you prepare students for official exams?
items.a: Yes! We prepare students for English exams (Cambridge): A2 Key · B1 Preliminary · B2 First · C1 Advanced. French exams: DELF A1–A2–B1–B2 · DALF C1. Other languages upon request. Our courses include mock tests, strategies, and targeted preparation for each exam section.

items.q: Do you offer classes for children, teenagers, and adults?
items.a: Yes. At Myker Academy, we teach students from age 5 onwards: Children (5–11) — dynamic groups and natural learning. Teenagers (12–18) — reinforcement, languages, certifications, and school support. Adults — general English, conversation, exam preparation, and one-to-one lessons. Each group is organized by level and age to ensure a good learning environment.

We are available from 9:00 to 20:00. Children and teens: group classes in the afternoon after school. Adults: morning or afternoon depending on availability. Private classes: flexible scheduling (morning/afternoon).

Yes. We offer private classes with different pricing options: 1 hour → €22. 10-hour pack → €200 (€20/hour). 20-hour pack → €350 (€17.5/hour). They are flexible, fully personalized, and focused 100% on your goals.

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.subtitle: We are here to help you with anything you need. If you want information about schedules, prices, levels, or bookings, you can call us, write to us, or visit us. We will be happy to assist you!
contactSection.scheduleNote: (We also reply to messages outside these hours whenever possible.)
contactSection.addressLine1: Av. Santa Coloma, 3, local 3, 08690, Santa Coloma de Cervelló
contactSection.addressNote: We are located in the town center, just minutes from schools and the bus stop.

items.name: Pedro Taqi
items.text: I needed to pass a French subject and ended up exceeding the required level. The intensive course with Inés was amazing. She is an excellent professional and thanks to her… I passed!

items.name: Martín Sánchez
items.text: An unbeatable experience at this English academy. The teacher was always kind, attentive, and willing to help. The teaching method is very dynamic and motivating. Highly recommended!

items.name: Arianna Pairada
items.text: Mike is exceptional. His empathy, patience, and teaching style make learning easy and enjoyable. He creates an inclusive environment where you feel comfortable from the first day.

ctaFinal.title: Do you want to improve your English, French, or school subjects?
ctaFinal.text: Book a free information session and find the perfect course for your level, objectives, and schedule.
ctaFinal.note: No commitment required. We only need to know your approximate level and goals to guide you better.
